reviews.review:
Portal!
A fun and challenging game.
Where you need to solve puzzles.
There is a story that's ok.
It's a little bit short!
It's still fun to play but if you could only buy portal or portal 2. I would buy portal 2!

Portal is a pretty good game, the puzzle's are fun and challenging.
There is a story, fun but a bit short, I completed the game in 3 hours.

Portal 2 is much better, with a great story, better puzzles and more content.
But Portal 1 is still pretty fun.

I would recommend to wait for a steam sale where portal 1 is just 1$ and portal 2 just 2$!
快通关了..打到逃跑那里终于受不了了.. 脑袋药丸 休息下改天继续 这游戏很棒 就是剧情有点迷 我的理解就是主角是个光圈的机器人。然后有个ai测试你 到最后想要谋杀你 然后你就开始想办法逃..不知道对不对 改天继续剧情 不知道有没有boss
The only game series i have ever stuck through the credits.

Good game, main game it's kind of short but also addicting and fun.
Bonus levels are a good challenge for people wanting more of the game and can be difficult, especially the time and steps challenges.
시발 말이 필요하냐? 이건 갓 겜이다. 그러니깐 꼭 사라 2000년 이후에 태어난 아이들이라서 하프라이프를 모르면 이걸 사서 해보는걸 추천한다. 이걸 하면 왜 벨브가 대단하고 게이브 뉴웰이 찬양받는지 알게된다. 만약 포탈을 다 깨면 포탈2도 하는걸 추천 합니다. 꼭해보세요.
필수템
Czy ta gra nie była czasem kiedyś darmowa?
Amazing story and awesome puzzles.

V社经典游戏。十分有创意性的玩法。

依旧很棒的剧情
如果觉得晕，可以在设置，高级，把FOV视场调到最大，
能有效缓解晕
我快疯了！
mi record esta en 65mins todo el juego, esta gud

ONE OF THE BEST GAME I PLAYED IN THIS YEAR, SO FAR.

The way portal introduces you to game mechanics, while still making it fun, challenging, part of the story and thus involving is just GREAT. Nice storyline, also. Too bad its a short game, other than that there's no negatives, if you're thinking whether or not to buy this game, think no more! I was skeptical at first, then bought it in a promo. Couldn't be more satyisfied.
Kısa ama güzel bir oyun. Herkese tavsiye ederim. İndirimlerde alınabilecek en güzel oyunlardan biri.
portal and portal 2 are the best puzzle games ever! the puzzles are clever yet never frustrating. I wasn't suprised since it came from the same people who brought us half life. 10/10 ign

the best puzzle game i have ever played its so fun and the final boss isnt that hard but its still great you have a portal gun so its confusing but not impossible

10/10

If you aren't playing this masterpeice then you're missing out.

A true classic which holds up in this day and age
kesinlikle kütüphanenizde bulunması gereken bir oyun senoryasu güzel oynanışı çok iyi ve valvenin geleneksel oyun tarzı dışında burda sadece silahınız portal açmaya yarıyor mermi atmaya değil... :)
Historia corta pero brutal

This game is absolutely amazing! It is so amazing that it is a must play and a gaming classic. Even though the game is short every second of the game is perfect with an alienating atomosphere, thought prevoking puzzles, and the constant insults from Glados who makes you hate her. This game was Valves trial run for the Portal gun and the puzzles are the perfect introduction into using it as you are gradually introduced to the mechanics of portal making. After you complete the first few puzzles you are rewarded with some more challenging ones (but nothing like the challenge of the puzzles in Portal Stories: Mel) and boy are these fun! Once these puzzles are solved you go find Glaos in her liar to get rid of her for once and for all. And this battle is amazing! Like the rest of the game this battle make you think and is the perfect boss battle for a puzzle game. Overall, this game is outstanding and is a must buy!
Lo compre despues de mucho y con tan buenas criticas que tenia y no decepciona para nada , ingenioso , maravilloso, un reto en los puzzles y encima tienes a glados. una autentica joya.
Nice game, good history <3

Si de verdad te gusta muchisimo la saga portal, compratelo, pero si no te da igual cual comprarte y no te quieres gastar mucho dinero comprandote los 2 portal comprate el 2, te va a dar muchas horas de juego.
+rep

Great puzzle-game. Also GLADOS is a really fun character with some great dialouge. The Portal gun is a great idea and the whole game manages to give you something new although it's completely based around the Portal Gun idea.
Çok başarılı bir puzzle oyunu, bu kadar geç oynamasaymışım keşke.  Çok güzel düşünülmüş ve herkesin oynaması gereken bir kült oyun.
Jogo faz muito a gente raciocinar, acho muito legal isso! Sem falar na história.

Troppo divertente e ben fatto sotto tutti gli aspetti!
Le soluzioni ai problemi sono in realtà piuttosto semplici fino quasi alla fine ma questo gioco è veramente troppo forte!

Muito bom, desafios realmente inteligentes e um senso de humor único.
Faz jus à fama
INCREÍBLE
adadad
Uno de los mejores que he jugado en mi vida, sin duda este juego me acaba de marcar para siempre... Totalmente recomendado, ahora a por Portal 2
Muy bueno

"I originally got Portal 2 first but I had to get the first one after finishing the second. The entire series is a masterpiece."

Edited for grammar after a couple of years. Lol.

Que dire de ce jeu ?

Il mérite bien ses 97% d'évaluations positives et cela pour plusieurs raisons :
- Un humour présent tout au long du jeu
- Des graphismes justes merveilleux pour l'époque
- Un univers qui est propre au jeu
- Un concept de jeu tout nouveau, pas un cod like
- Une difficulté croisante qui vous demendera de vous creuser les méniges
- Un rapport qualité/prix excelent 

Il y a juste quelques points où sa bloque :(
- La diffiiculté énorme au bout de 20 niveaux (Comme je le disais une dificulté croisante, et un peu trop même)

Bref, foncez tête baissé dans ce chez d'oeuvre du jeu vidéo !
스토리, 연출, 시스템, 지금 봐도 나쁘지 않은 그래픽까지 완벽
Интересна.Но сложна.

我是玩了第2代才玩1代. 1代難度相對比2代簡單, 變化沒那麼多.很快便破關. 不過不失為一款好遊戲.
建議順序先玩完1代再玩2代, 這樣趣味性也強點
포탈2하다 빡치시면 이거하고 기분푸셈
Игра понравилась!

吐くほど面白い

そんなに3D酔いする方じゃないと思ってたんですが、30分～1時間もやってると気分が悪くなりました。
でも本当に面白い。こまめに休憩を取ってやった方がいいでしょう。

気持ち悪くなってきたな…いやもうちょっとだけ…オエッ
玩了二代来补一代，在两个相近的墙之间开门可以和自己交易。
Sí.

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here:
HUGE SUCCESS
Its hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us
except the ones who are dead.

I love the credits song. The only game where I'll actually stick around for the credits (mainly to listen to the song).

I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere
right now
Even though you broke my heart and killed me
and tore me to pieces
and threw every piece
into
a fire
as they burn it hurt because
I was so happy for you

Anyway this cake is great its so delicious and moist
look at me still talking when theres science to do.

不过也只是一点点

不过非常有趣

第一次玩解谜FPS，游戏剧情很短，感觉很特别，没有一般FPS那样突突突的无脑。

游戏顶多3小时通关，不过打折3块钱买的，相当于免费玩了款游戏

还有一开始以为是个休闲的解密游戏，但是玩到后面还是觉得挺渗人的。

另外这游戏的世界观是和半条命一起的，玩过半条命的千万不要错过这游戏
интересная, короткая, со смыслом игра.
This is the best game I have ever played.
Gra jest świetna. Trzeba pomyśleć zanim zaczniesz robić Portale. Kupiłem tą grę na przecenie bo nie byłem pewny czy ta gra jest fajna. Najleprze 0,99 euro w moim życiu

One of the rare puzzle platformers that doesn't frustrate.

Meaningfully designed levels, which gradually teach you the mechanics. Some levels require a bit more thinking, but none are truly aggravating.

Reflexes are key to clearing some puzzles. But it's nothing an FPS player can't do. Classic FPS players I mean.

A masterpiece that is a break from usual FPS shooters. This is a must-play for any gamer. Even if you plan on playing just once.

good game with awsome physics :)
the training sessions where you have to "build" speed to pass them is cool
sometimes frustrating but thats alright , thats the point of the game
The only bad in this game: its too short :/
dizziness
10 тортиков из 10!

In this game, I died so many times from the energy thingies, but somehow, I was "Still Alive"! XD

Completing each task gave me so much satisifaction. Completing the entire game made me very "glad"os!

The robot thingy you fight is so honest it is inspiring. I was so inspired by this robot's honesty that I donated one or all of my vital organs to the Aperture Science self-esteem fund for girls.

The ending of this game is so freakin satisfying. The cake is so sweet and succulent and absolutely marvelously moist and real and not a lie.

GladOS reminded me of something important. I am not a real scientist. I have no friends. I am very unlikable. I am going to Android hell. GladOS taught me that "Two plus two is [static] … ten". After learning much math from her I became popular and not nerdy and got friends and got cake.

In conclusion, this was a triumph. I'm making a note here: huge success! Its hard to overstate my satisfaction.

cake/10

Вряд ли в 2к17 кто-то не играл в первый Portal, но если таковые еще имеются, то позвольте дать совет: купите эту игру и пройдите эту игру, т.к. она просто великолепна. Если вы хотите физическую головоломку, то Portal вам подойдет. Если вы хотите челлендж, то Portal вам подойдет. Если вы хотите концентированного черного юмора, то Portal подойдет вам тем более!

10 из 10.

И помните, в случае, если грузовой куб все же заговорит, Центр настоятельно рекомендует вам игнорировать его советы.
The fact that I've missed out on this game forr so many years is a crime. Absolute must own

Portal truly has one of the most original concepts and mechanics of all games, you'll really be amazed when you first play it. Nothing much to say about this one really, because it is a classic game that you should have already played by now. It is great, a must and also a nice game you can finish in a day or so. So if you still haven't played Portal don't hesitate to buy it along with Portal 2.
不知道，是否好玩，玩了十几分钟，3D画面看得我头晕，就退款了

Gioco carino, nulla da dire. Non è un gioco che si basa sulla trama ma è un rompicapo a logica. L'ho trovato abbastanza easy, diciamo che l'ho comprato e finito solo per l'achivement 'Spezzacuore' da bravo piskelletto dark 777. A parte gli scherzi, ci sta come gioco, assolutamente da non comprare per 10 euro, io ovviamente da bravo povero l'ho preso a 2 euro e qualcosa in bundle con il secondo. Buon game :)
7/10 (non è malaccio)

10 тортиков из 10.
Игра в которую должны поиграть все.
Игра которая заставила посидеть и подумать...

Отличная игра, рекомендую тем кто любит не сложные головоломки, очень понравился сюжет игры, и да он здесь есть, загадочен, присмотритесь хорошенько вокруг себя когда будете проходить камеры, кое что откроете для себя) Прошел неспешно игру за 3 часа, играл на телеке с геймпада, к концу игры проникся и очень втянулся в сюжет, меня можно было отогнать только ссаной метелкой))))

10 años después y las mecánicas superan a muchos juegos actuales.
Es un juego que destaca por su cuidado sistema de interacciones y jugabilidad.
Todo está dispuesto por algún motivo, ya sea ambientación o por saber llevar al jugador por ciertos lugares y ciertas formas para una mayor y más agradable experiencia. En esta versión del juego se explica en el apartado de comentarios del creador.

Desde que salió, el uso de los portales ha sido un factor muy suculento de establecer unas mecánicas con mucho potencial y algunos logros fuerzan al jugador a ponerlas al límite de forma satisfactoria.

La interacción con GLaDOS, cuyo nombre no es mencionado en ningún lugar del juego a excepción de una de las últimas escenas (según mi percepción. A lo mejor me equivoco), hace que una inteligencia artificial tenga sentimientos y cambie tu percepción de ti a medida que tus acciones hacen mella en su sistema indirectamente. Si nos ponemos cinéfilos, GLaDOS no es un auténtico robot ya que contradice alguna de las leyes de la robótica de Isaac Asimov (Hipótesis de un servidor ya que uno aún no ha jugado a Portal 2).

Además, como la forma de superar los retos son resueltos de una forma pacifista (ausencia del uso de armas), es una forma sencilla, efectiva y divertida de introducir a gente que no ha tocado un videojuego o, por lo menos, el género Shooter a este mundo cuya narrativa interviene de forma importante en la experiencia.

Por lo demás, recomiendo a cualquiera darle una oportunidad a este juego y a rejugarlo si uno le gusta coleccionar logros.

Portal is - without question - one of the BEST games on steam right now. The mechanics of shooting portals to solve puzzles is genius, and the puzzles are actual challenges without being unfair. I loved this game to bits, so I'm giving this game a 9.5/10. It's not a perect game, but it's pretty close!
Con este juego me he reído hasta en los créditos finales, es recomendable cada línea de su programación. Ojalá hiciesen juegos a la altura de Portal en nuestro año del señor 2017.
Beyinsizseniz Almayın :( DELİ ETTİ BENİ MK OYUNU

If you are thinking if you should buy it or not well I tell u BUY IT... It's a reaaaally nice game and has a pretty nice plot. 
Pros:

A little overpriced... I bought it as a pack with the Portal 2 too for 3 euros on Summer Sale so I didn't have a problem with that but I thought I should mention it

That's it buy it literally it's awesome (9/10)

Честно говоря купил сначала вторую часть,и так как она мне безумно понравилась,я решил попробовать и оригинал.
Скажу прямо - РАЗОЧАРОВАН!
Во второй части на МНОГО более длинный сюжет,там есть юмор,приколы,и действительно сложные уровни.Portal я прошел полностью за 2часа. За ДВА ЧАСА КАРЛ! это вообще не о чем.

Мой вам совсет - если хотите купить игру - берите PORTAL 2 - это действительно шедевр!
传送门一代还是很好通关的。剧情并不复杂，不过v社作品日常头晕。。。我都推荐别人拿这个联系晕3d。。。
Muy buena fluidez, exelente manejo de la gravedad, super recomendado una de las joyas de valve definitivamente

Portal é um jogo inovador para a época que foi lançado. Não por causa dos puzzles mas sim, como resolvemos eles.
Um modo historia expetacular com a vilã com um tom de sarcasmo e maldade.
Puzzles um pouco complexos, porem muito divertidos e foi muito inovador uma Portal gun.
Recomendo até para pessoas que não gostam de puzzle pois vão começar a gostar.

jogabilidade: 9.7/10
graficos 10/10
trilha sonora 8.1/10 (pois não há muitas músicas, porem quando há são muito boas)
enredo,conteúdo e história 10/10

Minha nota final 9.8
Excelente juego, aunque es algo viejo tiene esa esencia que permite que se te vallan las horas en el.

Un juegazo / clasico / genial / ingenioso / afrodiciaco / ok, tal vez lo ultimo no... Pero lo demas si.
Tiene una trama de por si simple, sin muchos "detalles" de historia, pero muy ingeniosa.

No andas a los tiros , o derrotando monstruos, o manejando vehiculos.
Sino solamente usando un arma que crea portales para pasar los niveles.
Pero SOLO con eso , el juego tiene muchas cosas.

Cada nivel, aunque al comienzo muy simples (obviamente) son cada vez mas ingeniosos en las formas de superar. Y ingeniosas, en serio. Me gustan los juegos de puzzles pero este me dejo "Mmmmm...", pensando que hacer en mas de una ocasion.

Una jugabildad "comoda". Es decir, no podes quejarte de que no podes pasar cierto nivel, por como se maneja al personaje. (El manco jugando sos vos en ese caso. -.- )

Ademas con la maquina que te vigila (Glados) y las cosas que dice. Es imposible no reirte al menos un poco en cada nivel.

Lo unico malo, es quizas que no tiene coop y que es bastante corto el juego.
Es decir, dependiendo de cuanto tiempo te tome pasar los niveles puede ser mas largo, pero si sos de mente rapida y los superas sin problemas no sera muy largo quizas.

Pero aun asi el juego lo vale.
(Y ademas esos 2 problemas se solucionan con el Portal 2, pero bueno, obvio jugar al 1 antes que al 2.)

Resumen, es un clasico, es muy divertido, esta genial  y no por nada cuando mires en la tienda este juego. Veras que o muchos de tus amigos Quieren este juego, o ya lo Tienen.
已解锁新成就  玩游戏时切出去会死机  ：）

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE

难度与portal 2相比实在是简单挺多
除了解谜元素之外剧情的体验也很棒
(现在才知道原来可以开字幕的)
(portal 2我啥都没开靠着听力口语通了_(:3j)

夏促入手，简直超值啊！美滋滋~

整个核心玩法给我的感觉可以用[b] 惊艳	[/b]来形容。
而且整个实验还带有一些深层次的意义：
[spoiler] “光圈科技”的实验室窗明几净，科技加持	[/spoiler]
[spoiler] 其背后的工厂却锈迹斑斑，污渍遍地	[/spoiler]
不禁让人陷入深思。

一路上会遇到许多障碍
而所能依靠的唯有手中的传送枪 
也有许多小机器人虎视眈眈
[spoiler](当然我们有很多方法搞它们，而且它们倒地的声音很萌啊) 	[/spoiler]
而朋友只有一个：爱心方块
它为我垫脚上坎
为我遮挡子弹
为我压住开关
而我却为了逃出生天
不得不将它扔进熔炉里面

当我一路跌跌撞撞
终于干掉这一切阴谋的主导者时
见到了久违的阳光
随即歌声响起
看着一点一点显现出来的字幕
我心头一凛，发现事情并不简单：
[spoiler] G胖势力已经骗光了我的血汗钱！！！！！！	[/spoiler]
es un muy buen juego la verdad siempre me llamo la atencion la mecanica de portales y todo me encanto su historia y en especial el enemigo principal simplemente una obra de arte
V社早期的良心满满的角色扮演闯关游戏， 不算精致的画面完全掩盖不了游戏的创意，长时间的游玩不仅不会让你感觉到无聊，反而会让你沉迷其中无法自拔，一步一步将你引入开发者的掌心中，你会慢慢感受到开发者的诚意以及游戏的细节处理是多么的完美，甚至被他的剧情所打动。推荐度：★★★★☆

Mein Lieblingsspiel (nach Portal 2), das vor allem durch den besten Bösewicht aller Zeiten bekannt ist.
Die Kreative Portal gun, und die damit zusammenhängenden Rätsel bieten ein gutes Gameplay, was von der SEHR Sarkastischen GLaDOS unterstrichen wird.

Vale completamente la pena, super original y entretenido, la historia principal es corta, pero los mapas secundarios también son geniales. Ahora a seguir con Portal 2.
Poco mas que decir, lo recomiendo.
好评  怎么感觉最后一关才是游戏主体啊
好久没有玩过这么棒的游戏了

Portal. Un jeu que je pourais décrire comme un classique sur steam. Bientôt se jeu aura dix ans d'existance. Alors, voyons voir si le jeu n'a pas trop viellie. Mais en bref, c'est un FPS ou on incarne une femme (jamais nommé dans le jeu) qui doit subir des testes alors qu'une IA l'observe.

Les points forts

- Les comandes sont très simple et facille à comprendre.
- La voix (car il y en a une sauf une autre mais mineure à la fin) est excellente.
- Concept inovant et qui n'a jamais été refait (sauf dans la suite et les mods crée par des fans dans d'autre jeux)
- On se creuse les meninges parfois mais on peut toujours trouvé les réponses.
- Des commentaire audio des dev sur les niveaux (si vous étes curieux)
- Des défis et des niveaus avancées à faire au dehors de l'histoire.
- Humour hillarant
- Boss Final très bien fait
- Les musique colle bien à l'ambiance
- Référance à Half-Life
- Les graphique sont bien

Point Faible

- Mais les environement sont très peu varié et la fin est seullement là que ça varie un peu.
- Un peu court.

Bref, un bon petit jeu sympa qui est recomendé à joué.
Игра просто восхитительна в жанре головоломок , GlaDOS one love .

通关时间5.8H，因为期间卡关没看攻略，大概有一两个小时有事在挂机，以及很少晕3D的我玩着玩着就头晕间歇性地玩，实际通关时间大概是4H。
通关后没有那种兴奋和愉悦感，反而有很多伤感。主要是portal的剧情方面，因为我比较喜欢剧情的体验，所以玩的时候一开始就开了字幕（字幕并不是无聊的成分，几乎是剧情的全部。
以下涉及剧情：
有两关墙壁被推开后可以进去，里面有彩蛋。其一是机器人刚出来的关卡，彩蛋房间里面会有The cake is a lie(蛋糕是一个谎言。以及Can help you？旁边有配图，画了箱子砸机器人可导致损坏。然后还有血手印。地上有HELP的求救信号，用血写出来的，可以看出是前几个测试者的呼救。第二个是同伴重量方块那一关，彩蛋方间里有很杂乱的信息，除了著名的The cake is a lie，还有一些配图和文字，可以自行摸索）所有画中人头都用同伴重量方块代替，意思应该是方块的破碎=死亡，其次 是对伙伴的重要性的提醒。
GLaDOS一开始是鼓励等语气引导玩家所操控角色，直到机器人那里就开始了变化，GLaDOS不是一个简单的人工智能，它的性情是多变拟人的。GLaDOS骗了主人公很多次，但结局你会看到被爆炸带回地面的Chell被拖到蛋糕旁，有庆祝，有朋友同伴重量方块（虽然先前被GLaDOS欺骗销毁了它，这让人很有感触。
让人感到伤感的正是Chell摧毁GLaDOS的那部分，尽管GLaDOS嘴里各种不在乎和厉声，但它害怕了。它开始的时候引诱Chell摧毁了自己的道德模块，然后按计划放毒气准备杀掉Chell，随着玩家操控的Chell的反击开始，它渐渐感到害怕。并且开始回顾之前与Chell说的所有话。[你的生日不会有任何伙伴来，你没有伙伴，你唯一的伙伴同伴重量方块也被你亲手摧毁了][我们是好朋友不是吗？（最开始与GLaDOS的相处确实是很愉快的][和档案上的一样，你就是一只刻薄的孤鸟……]无论是骂还是什么，从将模块扔向焚炉开始的那一刻起已经没有任何办法挽回了。（这让我的感触最深，确实已经无法挽回了。
虽然有过要害Chell但GLaDOS毕竟是Chell唯一鲜活的朋友。如果是现实中的两人走到这一步，想想就很伤心。
片尾曲我感觉GLaDOS更多是一个好点的形象出现，片尾曲也更加完善了GLaDOS的形象，这是GLaDOS自身的独白，并说到自己不会死。
而最后无论GLaDOS有多坏，她最后都为Chell准备了一场精心的宴会和蛋糕，不是吗？
虽然是很早的游戏了，但放到如今也能算是精品，虽然玩着头晕我也要点个赞！
